name: Puzzle Realms
description:
Puzzle Realms: A Cursed World is a Nonogram puzzle game that features:

50 HAND DESIGNED PUZZLES
- Each puzzle is designed to gradually ramp up the difficulty of the game and to be solvable without making you guess or use hints.

ENDLESS MODE
-As you progress through the game you will unlock endless mode. This mode allows you to play randomly generated puzzles for as long as you want.
